data.name: BagOfMushrooms
data.value: Allows you to consume a yummy mushroom snack occasionly. The saturation may power you up. Caution: Can cause throw up if you eat too much of the same ones. Press quick map to select another and cdash + dash to consume the mushroom.

data.name: BlessingOfTheButterfly
data.value: Your Wings have received the blessing of the butterfly, which allows them to crush enemies beneath them and repel even higher. While the wings rest on you, your enemies shall be shattered by your feet. From your best girl (besides Myla) c:

data.name: Camouflage
data.value: While doing nothing, your mind slowly ascent to Unn's dream, while your shell is shielded by Unn's power.

data.name: CaringShell
data.value: No hazard shall cast harm onto you... UwU

data.name: ConcussiveStrike
data.value: Your huge nail swings cause Concussion on their target, which will cause the target to suffer more from your nail and extend the concussion.

data.name: DeliciousMeal
data.value: You can now consume the "delicious" eggs to provide you a temporarily saturation effect to make your nail stronger and regenerate your wounds. Press jump on the egg in the inventory to consume the egg.

data.name: DiamondCore
data.value: The crystal heart's core absorbed the power of diamond and got even stronger. If you hit a wall, all foes may be stunned shortly. The power of the diamond increases over time, makes you unstoppable once you got enough power.

data.name: DiamondDash
data.value: The shell of crystal heart is powered with the might of diamonds, which causes a quicker energie cast and allows you to stop you mid air. Hold up to remain at your position. Drains souls rapidly.

data.name: DiminishingCurse
data.value: If you suffer from the curse of greed, it will vanish once you experienced enough pain after resting.

data.name: DreamBlessing
data.value:
The dream artifact uses the power it absorbs from their powerful victims to use it's hidden power.
Monomon: Through her knowledge she exposes the foes biggest weakness.
Lurien: His gaze may freeze the enemy in place.
Herrah: Invoking her children from the victim.

data.name: ElderbugHitList
data.value: When entering a new room with enemies the list marks enemies. If you succeed the \"talk\" with them, you are granted a reward. Be careful, elderbug demands a clean execution.

data.name: EternalSentinel
data.value: Increases your scent while wearing the sign of the protector. The shield of the ancient ones is more resistent and gather soul with the blessing of the protector.

data.name: EternalValor
data.value: The heat of the battle shall allow you to endure more pain.

data.name: EyeOfTheWatcher
data.value: The eye of the watcher will protect you and share it's sight, allowing you to see in the dark. If the eye can fully see you, it gaze may once prevent a fatal blow on you. To call the eye again, look through the tool of the watcher.

data.name: FlowerRing
data.value: The power of all existing flower are gathered if you channel powerful strikes.

data.name: FollowTheLight
data.value: Allows you to weave with the pure essence of light to form a portal which you can travel to. Moving to far away will destroy the unstable portal. Hold left while swinging the artifact of the light to weave the portal and hold right to travel through it. As long as the artifact has not its full potential, travelling will consume the energy of the dreams and destroy the portal once entered. If not, the portal will remain at your entry point. (Requires dream gate to work)

data.name: FriendOfTheJellyfish
data.value: Jellyfishs and explosions may no longer harm you.

data.name: GiftOfUnn
data.value: Grants you the power of Unn.

data.name: GloryOfTheWealth
data.value: Your enemies may "share" more of their wealth with you. Your wealth may protect you from the hits of those peasants... for a fee of course. Press Quick Map + Up to activate the effect and Quick Map + Down to cancel the effect. (In case you forget this input combination, the effect also deactivates itself once the leave the room). The cost increase fast over time while the effect is active and slowly decrease once inactive. If you are really greedy, the cost decrease faster. The great civilians of Hallownest call this power "Pay 2 Win".

data.name: GraspOfLife
data.value: While running on the ground, the breath of life shall grow grass below your feet. Sometimes, a pale blessed one may appear instead. Killing it, shall let your hear the cheers of the normal one.

data.name: GrassBombardement
data.value: Forms the grass in Hallownest with the power of the soul to a "special delivery" which explodes shortly after creation, dealing huge damage. The disruption may break loose walls and floors. Requires soul to construct the bomb. Press (Quick)cast and left to drop the bomb. They say, that you also can channel the blue plague, to create an even stronger bomb which can even break the heaviest stones and emits a destruction shockwave through the room. Press (Quick)cast and right to consume the blue blood and spawn the powerful nuke.

data.name: GreaterMind
data.value: You can now sense, which knowledge of the world you're missing."; Description = "Activates the tracker, to show you how many powers you are missing. If the counter is green, you have global access to the power in the area.

data.name: HappyFate
data.value: Your "happiness" increases all your abilities slightly. Getting hit makes you sad. :c A good rest may restore your hapiness.

data.name: HotStreak
data.value: Successfully striking enemies shall increase your power. The power will fade away from your weapon if it doesn't hit a foe.

data.name: Imposter
data.value: While being part of the shrooms, sometime you focus treacherous energys... AMOGUS

data.name: Infested
data.value: Plant spider eggs in the wounds of your victims, that burst open on death.

data.name: JellyBelly
data.value: You are feeling light, like a feather.

data.name: JellyfishFlow
data.value: You've gained the swimming agility of the jellyfishs... And you are now a part of the jellyspotters!

data.name: JonisProtection
data.value: When going to a new area, you will receive the gift of Joni, which will quickly fade away.

data.name: LifebloodOmen
data.value: Sometimes you will be haunted by a ghost from a distant land. Killing it will grant you the essence of it's soul. A more powerful weapon may attract more powerful foes.

data.name: MantisStyle
data.value: Your weapon may reach further away foes.

data.name: MarissasAudience
data.value: While Marissa sings on stage, occasionally spawns a crowd that helps you. If you killed her however... you will be haunted by her biggest fan.

data.name: MaskOvercharge
data.value: Let one your mask occasionly overcharge. If it is the one that protects you, it emits a searing circle, that also absorbs the loose soul around you.

data.name: MindblastOfUnn
data.value: Your dream nail emits the power of Unn to the target's mind, which causes their bodies to be more vulnerable.

data.name: OneOfUs
data.value: Occasionally you emit a spore cloud. (Hold the super dash button to prevent the cloud.)

data.name: OverwhelmingPower
data.value: Casting spells with full capacity will grant your spell much more power.

data.name: PaleLuck
data.value: When someone casts harm on you, sometimes you are blessed by the higher being instead. Especially if you have some artefacts related to him.

data.name: PureSpirit
data.value: Using the last resort of your soul will purify it's vessel and spawn an orb out of pure light. If you channeled three orbs, they will follow your powerful spell and detonate upon contact, returning their gathered soul to you.

data.name: QueenThorns
data.value: The thorns of agony have received the blessing of the queen.

data.name: RelentlessSwarm
data.value: Flukes rip the soul out of there victims.

data.name: ReluctantPilgrim
data.value: While you stay on the path, your nail shall receive the gift of the grubfather.

data.name: Requiem
data.value: When your shell breaks, holding a pure focus may arise you at the home of death. Holding the light's artifact will instead catch you in the protecting wings of the last one, if she opened her secret. Holding the shiny stone vessel, will drop your soul onto the now abandoned place, where the light started its revenge.

data.name: ReturnToUnn
data.value: Reject Bugness, return to Slug. You move faster to Unn.

data.name: SacredShell
data.value: Infuse your shell with the pale power of the monarch which grants you tenacity against strong strikes.

data.name: ScrewTheRules
data.value: Your rage is weaker but grows quicker.

data.name: ShadowForged
data.value: The void energy return quicker to you.

data.name: ShiningBound
data.value: Every magic relic you currently wearing shall gather more soul for you.

data.name: SoulExtractEfficiency
data.value: Allows you to drain soul more efficient from your foes and draw you reserve more quickly.

data.name: TouchGrass
data.value: The flora may nourish your shell, if you stand long enough near it.

data.name: Tourist
data.value: Want to see the incredible black egg temple? Talk to the firefly to the right. Drinks are not included in the price. Also offers back travel.

data.name: TrueForm
data.value: While the true form is revealed, its vessels nail gets more powerful. Especially near your true self.

data.name: UnitedWeStand
data.value: Your companions inspire each other.

data.name: WeDontTalkAboutTheShade
data.value: Shade? What should that be? Can you prove, that the "Shade" exist? Your soul vessel and geo? What are you talking about?

data.name: WellFocused
data.value: You gain pure focus faster.

data.name: WisdomOfTheSage
data.value: Guide the Sage through his journey to learn how to use your spells more efficient.

data.name: YouLikeJazz
data.value: Your hatchlings hatch way more aggressive and don't need that much soul to grow.
